# GitHub Workflows

Automated workflows for CI/CD and other GitHub Actions.

- [**ci-python.yml**](ci-python.yml): CI pipeline for Python testing and linting.
- [**ci-rust.yml**](ci-rust.yml): Build, format, lint, and test for the Rust codebase.
- [**pgvector17.yml**](pgvector17.yml): PostgreSQL 17 with pgvector, updated periodically.
- [**pr-agent.yml**](pr-agent.yml): Generates advanced descriptions and reviews.
